from rest_framework import serializers

from client.models.evidence import ChainEvidence, EvidenceType



[文档]class BlockchainEvidenceSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    区块链存证列表
    """
    evidence_type = serializers.CharField(source='evidence_type.name')
    evidence_type_ch = serializers.CharField(source='evidence_type.desc_name')
    number = serializers.CharField(source="credit_certificate.number")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = ChainEvidence
        fields = [
            'id', 'number', 'data_type', 'evidence_type', 'tx_hash', 'evidence_type_ch'
        ]




[文档]class BlockchainEvidenceTypeSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    存证类型
    """

[文档]    class Meta:
        model = EvidenceType
        fields = [
            'id', 'name', 'desc_name'
        ]
